trans-unit.source: Has full control over the application.

trans-unit.source: Can only use the application, but cannot edit its configuration.
trans-unit.note: Long description of the level of access of a user
Short description of the level of access of a user

trans-unit.source: Has the read permissions of the user, but cannot edit anything but their own profile.

trans-unit.source: Can read as a user, but not edit
trans-unit.note: Short description of the level of access of a read-only user
